Text: Vehicle deliveries slowed during the second quarter, falling to 3,553 from 3,989 in the first quarter despite the company's introduction of its ES6 crossover SUV in June. NIO's has fallen by over 60% since it began listing its shares on US exchanges in September 2018, as of Tuesday morning. .
Cause: Vehicle deliveries slowed during the second quarter, falling to 3,553 from 3,989 in the first quarter despite the company's introduction of its ES6 crossover SUV in June.
Effect: NIO's has fallen by over 60% since it began listing its shares on US exchanges in September 2018, as of Tuesday morning. .
Sentence: <e1>Vehicle deliveries slowed during the second quarter, falling to 3,553 from 3,989 in the first quarter despite the company's introduction of its ES6 crossover SUV in June.</e1> <e2>NIO's has fallen by over 60% since it began listing its shares on US exchanges in September 2018, as of Tuesday morning. .</e2>
